website_summaries.verdict: For those seeking a decent quality entry-level metal detector with a time-saving pinpoint button, the Ace 250 is the one to consider. Suitable for children, but not a "toy" model.
pros: Online instructional videos are helpful for beginners
cons: Overly sensitive to junk rocks with mineral content
Many false readings, does not discriminate well

customer_reviews.title: Garrett wins HANDS DOWN!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a surprise for my husband for Fathers day. It was an upgrade from his little Bounty Hunter brand. I blind folded him and took him out to a park he had never explored and gave it to him. When he saw that Garrett logo he lit up like a kid at Christmas! Best off all he found a Colonial button right off the bat! This model was much more sensitive than his previous one, it has settings to filter out metal types so you can narrow down your search. Garrett needs a bumper sticker that says " Go Garrett, or Go Home" LOL Nothing compares! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingMom

customer_reviews.title: It is much better than many models that are way more expensive
customer_reviews.text: After much research we decided to purchase this model, my husband loves it!! It is much better than many models that are way more expensive. If you don't want to spend a thousand on a metal detector, then this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Miss B Math Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Whole lotta machine for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine based upon forem posts and comments as well as YouTube vids not to mention the low price tag. I will certainly say, this detector delivers! I've dug around my neighborhood and my family's property for 2 weekends and after I got used to how the ace 250 works, I dug several really cool relics. I dug a silver plated copper wedding band, a runners medallion and several other things that brought a smile to my face. Also found a bunch of clad coinage. The battery is still 75% full! I would highly recommend this machine to anyone wanting to get into the hobby or a great upgrade to a beginner's machine. Very satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: The first one only lasted 45 minutes. Customer service rep was doubtful the unite wasn't working properly, because they don't have claims on this model. After I told my story a new one was shipped to me. It has worked very well. Great detector for the money. Very sensitive unite, and great for beginners. It is fun right outta the box.
customer_reviews.author: avery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: First day I received this amazing tool, I took it out into the backyard just to see if it worked. The first thing I found and dug up was a 1980's McDonald's foil lined ketchup packet 6" deep. This thing WORKS. And it has my name on it, so that's a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: but I will say with the research I've done prior to buying it and my couple years of using this that it would be a great first b
customer_reviews.text: This is my first detector so I cannot speak comparatively so nor do I claim to have much authority on the subject, but I will say with the research I've done prior to buying it and my couple years of using this that it would be a great first buy for someone looking to take on the hobby. There is no perfect all around detector(from what I understand) but this is a very good middle of the road one in which you will get a very nice detector without totally breaking the bank. It's very user friendly and gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed my first few times out
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is an okay entry level detector. I was a little disappointed my first few times out. The third time out I found about 20 coins! Don't get frustrated, and learn how to use your machine. Just because it says it's a quarter or a penny does not mean it is! If you pass over a Target 3 times and you only get a signal once, you're probably going to dig trash. I would highly recommend the Garrett pro pointer. Even though it cost almost as much as the detector, it will speed your recovery time greatly. Happy Hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: It is a good detector for the beginner, gets good depth it found a 1853 half dime at 7 inchs deep, and it is a rugged machine, only draw backs is the control housing is not waterproof and the pinpoint is not accurate, but other than that its a amazing machine it's helped me find and save some history and it made me upgrade to a AT-PRO which I'm also getting from the same place, great people to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for shallow objects 2-8" inches.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an inexpensive way to find my septic tank distribution box, hoping it would pick up the re-rods embedded in the concrete. I thought from the page that the depth worked 2-4' feet but found its 2-4" inches and it has an 8" plus mode. Bottom line it works great for shallow use 2-4 inches and has a pinpoint button that lets you hear and identify exactly where the object is. I was able to uncover a lot of rocks that have iron in them but not my distribution box - haha.
customer_reviews.author: BowKnight

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used it to find my wedding ring in a 2 acre pasture. It was very helpful to exclude all metals except gold. If something is on the surface of the grass, it says it's 6" deep, so that feature doesn't seem as accurate. However, when I did dig down to find few mystery items (rusty nail, soda can tab, it was accurate. I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use  simple not over complicated
customer_reviews.text: Have found lots of coins and 3 gold rings with this unit.also purchased an ace 300 recently. I prefer to use the ace 250. The 300 just adds a bunch of extra noise and features that are annoying. The basic ace 250 is my choice for metal detecting. Simple easy to use for anyone. It will find gold rings. I have found 3 gold rings showing up on the unit under the nickel indicator. My experience has been its a nickel or gold when I get a solid signal indicating there's a nickel in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Ace 250 is 5 stars in my books
customer_reviews.text: Ace 250 is to me the best MD you can get for its price, EZ and quick to learn. You be getting hits on targets your first time out. their pinpointed is the best helps you to dig exactly where you need to 5 stars in my book
customer_reviews.author: francis a.

customer_reviews.title: It works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to try to find a surveyor's pin on a property corner but didn't locate it. May not have even been there. The first time I used it for treasure hunting, I found a quarter in less than 2 minutes.. I used it a few more times and found some junk. I'm an old man and it was too hard for me to get down on my knees to dig, so I ended up selling it.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Opened box
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. Arrived with an open box. Looked like a demo model had been sold. Total bummer. Everything appears to be there, but another example of an order being passed off as "new." Hopefully, it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Veto Twain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product I must have already found over $800 in a river. Located item and works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: After having watched multiple seasons of The Curse of Oak Island, I felt my recently retired adventure-loving dad should take up the art of metal detecting. After much research, the Garrett Ace 250 seemed to be voted best for novice yet determined treasure sportsmen and price was inline with competition. My vision of father/daughter competitive prospecting was short lived - couldn't count on his commitment to Gary Drayton stardom. I however did venture out with the machine and masterfully detected 3 can tabs, a metal bracket, and presumably vintage 1980's Budweiser can.
customer_reviews.author: Jen_CLT

customer_reviews.title: Can’t remember what product I ordered apparently
customer_reviews.text: Spent over 200 dollars to receive 2 kiddie fishing poles for plastic magnetic fish. Like a 7 dollar item for over 200. Sending it back for a refund and do not plan on buying again unless they right this
customer_reviews.author: Jack Modjeska

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product did not beep when going over coins that we knew were in the ground. Very disappointed in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Defective Screen out of Box
customer_reviews.text: Brand new detector had defective screen. Bottom half/right side of LCD display would not appear. Amazon will be sending another machine, but if it isnt as described. I will NEVER use Garrett again... Not happy..
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Balys

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to have good discrimination despite lots of practice with it
customer_reviews.text: Have read all books, watched all the videos. Does not seem to have good discrimination despite lots of practice with it. Not overly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's not accurate . It does not distinguish between coins at all or even gold.
customer_reviews.author: Jamil Allati

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a treasure hunter. I needed to locate old corner markings rods for a farm I was selling and was going to have to pay several thousand dollars for a survey if the buyer could not be assured where the fence lines were to be located. Found them all in one morning, plus a bunch of barb wire, old gas lines and other misc junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell F. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Good metal detector for the price. Last summer we started metal detecting and we have been using this one for a year. We use in up at our cabin in slightly rocky soil. It usually picks up money accurately. We found dimes and pennies that it accurately identified. The depth is usually close to what the detector indicates. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to start metal detecting.
customer_reviews.author: Cameala Freed

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective and returned.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars because the detector was defective and returned so I can't say much. But what I can stay is shipping was super fast and the detector was light weight and easy to use and returning the item was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love my metal detector. I am adding a 5" x 8" DD coil to it to make it even better. I have found all sorts of clad and fun items. With my new coil I'm adding to it I'll be able to search yards and be able to get through the trash.
customer_reviews.author: KingBenG

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money; fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for 10 hours or so to this point and I am extremely pleased. What fun! It is very easy to use and I have already made many wonderful discoveries from scraps of history to a valuable coin. I should have bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Harry C.

customer_reviews.title: Coil went bad after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Coil went bad after only a few uses. The thing pings metal all over the place (including the air). Reset it twice, but nope it's a bad coil. Checked forums about this and it seems like I'm not the only one who has had this problem. If it happens to you send it in to Garrett if it's still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Billpete002

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to use and learn. Sensitivity is more than adequate. After reading the manual (you remember those things) i threw a few coins on the carpet to listen for the differences in tone with the difference in size of the object. It was giving me "finds" where I had no coins. Then I remembered, ten years ago when I had new carpet put down, I tightened up the flooring with some nails. It was finding the heads of finish nails under the carpet. Very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Pat-inCO

customer_reviews.title: Easy easy easy. Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: It's the classic 250. How can you go wrong. I have an equinox 800 but I carry this everywhere I go. My GF uses it and my friends use it. I've matched it with a Nell toronado. Perfect set up for field-type (clean) sites.
customer_reviews.author: Tac medic

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is a disappointment! Not worth the price and seller does not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a charm to find good stuff. After a year of occasional detecting, it more than paid for itself in finds, including gold and silver rings. Easily distinguishes between the different types of coins. Still can't distinguish between rings and pull tabs from cans, but that's typical of all the detectors in this price range. Overall, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Baldr Odinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and haven’t gotten to really test it out but it seems to be working properly. It is very light weight. Can’t wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Houston

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have only used it to find screws and nails around the house where siding was installed, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hunley

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have not found any gold at all. It gives many false beeps. It is good for finding iron but that is it... I was expecting a lot more for such expensive equipment. Sometimes it does not even beep with gold jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Sandoval Castro

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This does not come with the headphones, but overall satisfied with it. It is a beginner detector and easy to use. Looking forward to hunting treasure this year
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I used this metal detector just the other day to help me find a broadhead arrow that I couldn't find after shooting a deer. This saved me about 30 bucks........didn't have to buy a replacement arrow.
customer_reviews.author: patinthedeli

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 250 in April of 2014 and played with it a few times and put it away without batteries. Recently I needed to locate a metal property maker and the unit would not power up. I called Garret in Garland Tx. and even though the unit was out of warranty, they agreed to repair it. Sent it to them and had it back in one week fixed at no cost other than shipping to them. This is the only metal detector I have owned so I cannot compare the functionality with others units. What I can say is that the customer service is excellent which is something I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Stars - Not a 3 or 4
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was 3.5 star rating because a 3 is a bit too low but a 4 is too high. It is well made product. I don't like two things. 1. There is absolutely no volume control. There is absolutely no way you could use headphones without destroying your ear drum. 2. The detector is very mineral sensitive. I turned down the default setting but it seems to go off way too frequently. I know I need to get used to it but it seems to go off too much. I have dug up several rocks which must have copper or such in them. Wish it was gold but nope :(
customer_reviews.author: straightforward

customer_reviews.title: The most for your money!
customer_reviews.text: My first "real" detector. Takes a bit of practice but very easy to use. Extremely sensitive. Pinpoint feature is very handy. A coin MAGNET! Love it! Will be purchasing more garrett products in the future. The best detector for the price, period.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Allan

customer_reviews.title: I love my Garrett Ace 250
customer_reviews.text: The Ace 250 is a working piece of art, it will find anything that the more expensive metal detector does.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Ceballos`

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a metal detector. It works. Im sure if you took the time and really tweaked the discrimination it would be really good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Freisinger

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the beginner at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and filters work fairly well. Found my Wife's lost ring after about 3 hours of searching. I would prefer the frequency to increase as you get close to certain metals rather than volume to decrease.
customer_reviews.author: SWW

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This detector has been so much fun! We never fail to find cool stuff, and the discrimination modes really work well if you're in an area heavily strewn with iron junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carey

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable, buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I had a metal detector 10 years ago. Nobs and switches everywhere. I couldn't understand or use it. I have had the Ace 250 less than a month and found 10 wheat pennies, a silver dime and a 1918 quarter 8 inches in the ground! It takes little time to learn to use it. Target ID is extremely accurate at small depth and not accurate for deep targets. This is a metal detector that can find targets at 8 inches! Discrimination works great, you can filter out iron and steel. This is a professional metal detector for 200 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: This works so good may wait a while
customer_reviews.text: Excellant bought one last spring for myself. Took gandaughter out when she came to vist and she wanted one for Christmas. This is her christmas gift. I was going I To upgrade to ATPro next Spring, This works so good may wait a while.
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: I was Looking For IP Iron Pins and Found Them With This
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product mainly (ok really only) to find my IP road pins on a large tract of land I own. I have many tracts and lots of pins and only knew the "general area" that they were. Bamm!!! This thing helped me immensely and saved me a "resurvey and spot" fee to find the road. So, for me it paid for itself immediately and then some. I will use it for other uses and see how that works out.
customer_reviews.author: Shed Helpers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great and good depth, only quam i have with it is the pinpointer is all over the place. I also wish they had a number display and sounds that differ than just iron one, tab nickel, 2nd sound and, everything else sounds the same gold silver ect. This is waterproof but does not do well in the saltwater. For the price and for beginners its great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not excellent
customer_reviews.text: Have used this metal detector a number of times for work, finding corner indicators in a field. It works, but get a lot of false positives, making it difficult to pinpoint the object. I'm sure that by spending a lot more money I could have a better experience, but for the price this fills the bill nicely. If you are looking for a beginning unit, give this one a try
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: A Treasure Hunting You Will Go!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and easy to use. However not easy to find things that aren't trash! Good luck treasure hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Hold currency in place nice size.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this wallet. Great for people on the go. Nice fitting pockets for your credit card. Leather durable.
customer_reviews.author: Truman

customer_reviews.title: Garret ace fun hobbie
customer_reviews.text: Love my Garrett ace ! Wish I had more places to use it at but people don’t like u digging up their yard .
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Caudill

customer_reviews.title: it is very good quality and all she needs for now
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece for Christmas, she is 12 and i cant believe how well she has learned to use it. it is very good quality and all she needs for now.
customer_reviews.author: Obedingding

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Super excited and very pleased. My granddaughter and I watched the video that provides great information and ideas. First time out with it mainly wanting to get used to the tones, we found 2 dimes and 3 penny and a crushed soda can. May not seem like much to some but it put big smiles on our faces. Going to the beach with it in a few weeks, should be fun Thank for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Piney

customer_reviews.title: i am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: *Christine's husband here* I wanted one of these for a while and decided to get one. I have found coins in my backyard buried 6 or 7 inches deep. Eventually I will hit the park or the woods to see what I can locate there.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Excellant and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for myself and one for my son, eight years old. He learned quickly how to use it. First time out we Went to a location on the old Erie Canal in upstate NY. Hoping to find some old coins or relics. The ACE 250 worked great. We didn't find anything of importance, 3 beer tabs, 1 old nail and a spent shot gun shell. But it was exciting. Definitely recommend the ACE 250. Hope to find better treasures on our next trip out, trying a location where a battle of the French and Indian War took place, would love to find a musket ball. Happy treasure hunting......
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: It's not self explainitory, settings wonky & frustrating
customer_reviews.text: A nice dectector although difficult to get settings correct in order to find what your searching for. It is complicated. Have had to watch YouTube videos and I'm tech savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fun time, has a learning curve but if you stick with it you figure it out
customer_reviews.author: T. Leheny

customer_reviews.title: Hey, it’s a Garrett. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Garrett. The name alone means you won’t be disappointed. Will take some practice to recognize the tones while hunting but it’s lightweight and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: I have had a lot of fun with this already
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mid-price entry level metal detector but did not want a toy. After reading some reviews I settled on the Ace 250. After using it for about 80 hours I can not see why anyone would need to spend more money to get into this hobby. I have found a few dozen coins and some other interesting pieces. The discrimination feature is helpful when trying to target items in areas with a lot of buried trash. The Ace 250 came with a DVD that really helps get to started quickly. I have had a lot of fun with this already, and am really pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: very easy to pick up and learn as you use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad , very easy to pick up and learn as you use . Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Good detector
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a lot of detectors in this price range over the last 30 years and this is the best one I've had. The ;last Garret I had was a Freedom Ace about 25 years ago. This one costs about what that one cost back then but you get a much better detector for that price now. I would recommend this detector to any beginner for functionality and ease of operation. In fact, I'd give it six stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E. King

customer_reviews.title: Nectar Sector
customer_reviews.text: The unit came packaged well. Unit was assembled and functioned normally. It was a great time first time out. Found some nectar! The only issues are the plastic coil cover has an extremely tight fit. I had to pry it off with a flat blade. The weather cover comes up short when trying to velcro it together.
customer_reviews.author: Phil d.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time! Exactly as ordered. Works great! Even used the lower portion in salt water and on the sand (did not fully submerge). You just have to alter the settings a little.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bruha

customer_reviews.title: Good Metal Detector
customer_reviews.text: Great metal detector for a beginner. I recommend getting a pin pointer and a set of head phones as well. I have a good deal of trouble finding the item just using the detector as the pin pointer (I am an amateur though). I recommend headphones as people tend to look at you as obnoxious when you walk around and there is a constant ding ding ding ding. Good starter detector though!
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: good metal detector for the price , had a lot of fun with this product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I used it to search for underground water tank and piping. It found the tank easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Gimenez

customer_reviews.title: very good for beginners wanting to get into metal detecting
customer_reviews.text: very good for beginners wanting to get into metal detecting, accurate target display for identifying coins. pinpoint function gives false reading in damp mineral rich soil/sand accurate in dry soil/sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking For Something Big
customer_reviews.text: I haven't recouped my purchase price, but I've had a whole lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Big

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome little detector
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little detector. It was easy to learn to use. The screen can be seen with ease and the readings on it are pretty self explanatory. Watch the 15 minute video that comes with the unit and you'll be out detecting in no time. I also purchased the Garrett Pro Pin Pointer which makes locating your finds in the dirt and sand a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great right out of box!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly accurate. We found a plastic and metal earring back on the beach. Wow! Now to find the diamond stud that goes with it..... So far, lots of fun! The video included was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget J.

customer_reviews.title: Money and Bottlecaps Galore!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far but love it. Found lots of change and bottle caps at the beach. Can't wait to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Nygell

customer_reviews.title: Working great!
customer_reviews.text: I watched the online videos before the Ace 250 arrived so I would understand some of the functions. The book and DVD are a great help to get you started. I have only used the Ace 250 for a while in the yard and it picked up some very small pieces of tin as well as tin cans up to 6" deep. Can't wait to get to a park or playground with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Works well For the price works as good as a At pro just no bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Works well For the price works as good as a At pro just no bells and whistles, but if your good you don't need them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: a great kit for my fathers new hobby. a good intermediate level metal detector that wasnt too difficult to also learn with.
customer_reviews.author: Maco

customer_reviews.title: It picked up so many tiny targets even turned all the way down was a little annoying. Also used at a different site and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it in area with alot of debris looking for a large survey mark. It picked up so many tiny targets even turned all the way down was a little annoying. Also used at a different site and was extremely sensitive to what must have been iron rich soil. Did not try the feature that cancels certain hits, hoping that takes care of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brad H.

customer_reviews.title: ... had much time to use it with all the bad weather, works good
customer_reviews.text: haven't had much time to use it with all the bad weather, works good.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter detector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter detector. The kids and i have loved it. So for we have found a handful of coins, a few earings, a keychain and a necklace. The settings are easy to use and easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Helgesen

customer_reviews.title: So light!  Great detector.
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law loves it. It's super light, easy enough for my 9 year old niece to use but not cheap either. The "president" of the local metal detector club (who knew) said he was super impressed with it and wanted to get one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Chavez707

customer_reviews.title: old Grandson loved it. Easy to assemble and he started finding ...
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr. old Grandson loved it. Easy to assemble and he started finding buried treasures immediately (although some were trash! LOL) Figured most features out just by using it, although it comes with a nice book to tell you all the features. Nice that batteries were included.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: 😎
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use.something to do when there is nothing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Keith w.

customer_reviews.title: these are nice, but the basic design and displays have been ...
customer_reviews.text: these are nice , but the basic design and displays have been around for a long time . garrett makes good stuff , and these will be great for your first few years ( you might get tired of hunting for crap )
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great settings
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate help full video for beginers tells depth great light and easy to use batteries don't run down quick
customer_reviews.author: nicholas d.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great metal detector. I purchased a lesser one for my kids to begin with and regretted it. This one rocks for the kids. First time out my son successfully found an old pocket knife. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lchase12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great detector. Very well made. Just wish the the lettering on main pad was a bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts didnt fit out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It is like there was too much paint on either metal end of the metal tubes that that attach. Emery cloth-paint removal and it slides on ok. Looking forward to using.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to use, and put together. Just what I wanted to search for treasures. Searching has made me more interested in history. I live near an old battlefield and the metal dector has sparked my interest in finding the past.
customer_reviews.author: annieb13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far....like the way you can chose what you want to find!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Great metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Does amazing I highly recommend this product for pros and beginners it works like it supposed to and better has just about the same settings as the 400 it was built great and haven't had any problems with it yet and I've had it for 10 months works like new
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day at first I was only finding trash but has I used it the better stuff I find on the beach I found a 14k ring a silver ring and a bunch of change
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Very good metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Very good metal detector, I am not an expert, but I like the product and find it easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Pat H

customer_reviews.title: First detector owner
customer_reviews.text: Got my Acer 250 and watched video included in my order. Took it out and started searching on our property. Quick delivery! Great detector EASY to use and lightweight. The pictures are from my first see how, minus the bottle caps and cans. Found old underground water pipe from old well we never knew about. This is fast becoming a great new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: RLBabin

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used once so far at a nearby lake beach. Found some quarters. Headphones actually work better than expected and I am a Bose user.
customer_reviews.author: Harwood62

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This metal detector is very good for its price I cant put it down, its so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bhutjolokia

customer_reviews.title: Great model and the built in pinpoint make digging fun ...
customer_reviews.text: Did some research on metal detectors and this one kept coming up. Great model and the built in pinpoint make digging fun for my son! We have found items on every adventure we've been on!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: First rate metal detector
customer_reviews.text: This metal detector compliments my two other detectors very well. The Garrett 250 works the first time, every time. The first time I used it, we found several coins and was very accurate when it showed the depth of the item. This will become my main metal detector.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, will definitely buy it again. So much fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great detector for the beginner or novice.
customer_reviews.text: After researching similar price point detectors i am happy with my choice. Very easy to use. You really need to learn the tones as stated in the video. Its a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift for my fiance. We took it to our local beach and it found a bread tie buried about 6 inches in the sand. Not a great treasure find but it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy T.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough on how good it works. Its perfect for beginners. Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gosney

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there is better ones on the market that are more precise and much more expensive. But if you are going to just md for fun this is very easy to pick up and learn. Every time I have got a strong signal their was something to find! I would also recommend a Garrett pinpointer to make finding your treasure significantly faster and make the hobby much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Zappas

product_meta.title: Garrett Ace 250 Metal Detector with Submersible Search Coil
product_meta.description: ACE 250 is an outstanding all-around metal detector at a reasonable price. It is easy to tune and easy to use. The ACE 250 is recommended for beginners as well as "old pro’s". It can be used to hunt old coins, jewelry, relics, artifacts, buried treasures and other valuables. Charles Garrett says "Our ACE detectors offer excellent depth, rugged design and performance at a price only Garrett can offer. It’s no surprise that our ACE’s have become the worlds’ most popular metal detectors." Of course you’d never expect a detector with this price tag to offer so much greatness. Just one more reason, you need the ACE 250.
feature_bullets: Accept/Reject notch for specific target detection and to ignore unwanted items
Electronic pinpoint for easy target recovery
Sensitivity Control : Adjusts to 8 Levels of Sensitivity for Differing Ground Conditions
